name: Yotta
headline: Save money and win prizes up to $10m through weekly number draws.
description: Users save money, get over 2x the national average in interest and weekly chances to win additional prizes up to $10 million through weekly random number drawings.

founders.name: Adam Moelis, Founder
founders.description:
Wharton '14
Investment Analyst @ Goldman Sachs
Data Product Analyst @ YipitData
Co-founder @ Yotta

## CRYPTO BUCKETS
Earn an average 2% APY with more tickets in our weekly drawings.Your USD is automatically converted to USDC. Crypto yields without the hassle. No fees and convert back to USD at any time.

generated_description:
Yotta is a modern savings platform that blends the thrill of gaming with the practicality of personal finance. Founded in 2019 and located in New York, Yotta operates as a neobank, and it‚Äôs part of the Y Combinator S20 batch‚Äîan indicator of its startup pedigree. With an enthusiastic team of just eight employees, Yotta‚Äôs mission is straightforward and enticing: save money and win big.

What sets Yotta apart is its unique approach to savings. Users not only earn over twice the national average interest but also get weekly chances to win prizes that can scale all the way up to a whopping $10 million. It's like having a savings account that also doubles as a lottery ticket‚Äîexcept, it doesn't cost a thing to play. The fundamental idea is that saving should be fun, and Yotta has made strides to gamify the experience.

Yotta's offerings include prize-linked savings accounts, a debit card, and even cryptocurrency buckets. But perhaps its most captivating feature is the chance to win cash prizes every week, where users can accumulate tickets based on their savings. So far, Yotta has made its mark with over $12 million in winnings awarded to its users‚Äîa testament to its engaging model.

The company also emphasizes security, partnering with established institutions to ensure user funds are safe. Their app has received excellent feedback, boasting a solid rating of 4.8 out of 5.0 on Trustpilot from hundreds of reviews.

If you‚Äôre ready to rethink the way you save, Yotta is a compelling option that invites over a million participants to indulge in a little risk with their savings‚Äîwhile keeping their principal intact. To explore more or join the movement, check out their website at [withyotta.com](https://www.withyotta.com).
